quote: In case it's escaped your notice, that bastard has tried to kill me twice now. How about using your considerable power to track him down rather than trying to unravel my unremarkable past?
quote_letters: IN CASE ITS ESCAPED YOUR NOTICE THAT BASTARD HAS TRIED TO KILL ME TWICE NOW HOW ABOUT USING YOUR CONSIDERABLE POWER TO TRACK HIM DOWN RATHER THAN TRYING TO UNRAVEL MY UNREMARKABLE PAST
